# Exceptions Docs

## Exceptions

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md): Learn how to handle and throw exceptions in .NET. Exceptions are how .NET operations indicate failure to applications.
- [Exception class](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/exception-class-and-properties.md): Learn more about: Exception class and properties
- [Use user-filtered exception handlers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/using-user-filtered-exception-handlers.md): Learn how to use user-filtered exception handlers in C# and Visual Basic.
- [Handle COM interop exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/handling-com-interop-exceptions.md): Learn more about: Handling COM Interop Exceptions
- [Best practices](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/best-practices-for-exceptions.md): Learn best practices for exceptions, such as using try/catch/finally, handling common conditions without exceptions, and using predefined .NET exception types.

## How-tos

- [Use the try-catch block to catch exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/how-to-use-the-try-catch-block-to-catch-exceptions.md): Use the try block to contain statements that might raise or throw an exception. Place statements to handle exceptions in one or more catch blocks.
- [Use specific exceptions in a catch block](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/how-to-use-specific-exceptions-in-a-catch-block.md): Learn more about: How to use specific exceptions in a catch block
- [Explicitly throw exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/how-to-explicitly-throw-exceptions.md): Learn how to throw an exception explicitly in .NET by using the C# throw statement or the Visual Basic Throw statement.
- [Create user-defined exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/how-to-create-user-defined-exceptions.md): Learn how to create user-defined exceptions, which are an alternative to the hierarchy of exception classes derived from the Exception base class in .NET.
- [Create user-defined exceptions with localized exception messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/how-to-create-localized-exception-messages.md): Learn how to create user-defined exceptions with localized exception messages
- [Use finally blocks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/standard/exceptions/how-to-use-finally-blocks.md): Learn more about: How to use finally blocks
